Episodes.Title: The Story of Nelson's Nephew Nigel
Episodes.Plot: Nelson's naughty nephew comes to stay with him and causes chaos wherever he goes. The mischievous little elephant soon learns the importance of the rainy season on the savannah.

Episodes.Title: The Story of Georgina Queen of Fashion
Episodes.Plot: Nelson's naughty nephew comes to stay with him and causes chaos wherever he goes. Georgina has become a trendsetter and all the animals compete to match her latest fad. When the animals decide to hold a fashion show, Georgina realises how ridiculous the situation has become.

Episodes.Title: The Story of Lily's Little Brother
Episodes.Plot: Lily is very upset by the arrival of a new egg in the nest. She is jealous of the attention her mother and everyone else pays it. Lily tries to teach the egg a lesson but is surprised to discover she does love him after all become.

Episodes.Title: The Story of The Big Billabong Wave
Episodes.Plot: Joey and his friends are eager to learn to surf after Carrie the Cockatoo tells them of her holidays by the beach. The only problem is, there aren't many waves on the billabong. Are any of the young animals patient enough to wait for the legendary billabong wave Wally Two Trees has told them about?

Episodes.Title: The Story of Toby's New House
Episodes.Plot: Cartoon series about Lucy, who lives next door to a zoo and every night is told a story by the animals. When the animals on the savannah spring clean and redecorate their homes, Toby the Tortoise gets upset as there isn't much he can do to his shell. He soon realises that perhaps his old shell was perfect after all.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The Story of Jamie The Littlest Puffin
Episodes.Plot: Jamie is the littlest puffin on Mossy Bay Island who often sucks his feather. The other puffins and Hercule Moustache all try to help him stop the habit.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The Story of Ronald's Swimming Lesson
Episodes.Plot: The animals are setting off on a picnic, but how are they going to get Ronald across the river? Ronald learns to swim with the help of his friends.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The Story of the Puffin's Treasure
Episodes.Plot: Jamie is the littlest puffin on Mossy Bay Island who often sucks his feather. The other puffins and Hercule Moustache all try to help him stop the habit.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The Story of Victor's Bad Teeth Day
Episodes.Plot: Victor the crocodile refuses to brush his teeth. Eventually his mouth gets so dirty the other animals have to take action and help him clean them.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The Story of Snowbert's New Friend
Episodes.Plot: When Snowbert and Sidney have an argument, Snowbert builds a new friend out of ice.

Episodes.Title: The Story of the Play and Splash Pool
Episodes.Plot: Joey has built himself a play pool, but he is upset when the other animals ruin it. What can they do to make amends to their friend?

Episodes.Title: The Story of Melanie's Little Helpers
Episodes.Plot: Melanie is not very good at turning on her snowboard. Luckily, Randolph the racoon has an ingenious plan to help her.

Episodes.Title: The Story of Joey's Sleepover
Episodes.Plot: Joey's mum and dad are going out so Joey is going to Phoebe's for a sleepover. He learns how to adapt to other people's routines and way of life.

Episodes.Title: The Story of The Jungle Pie
Episodes.Plot: Kevin is a very fussy eater. Georgina decides to make an amazing Jungle Pie to show Kevin just what he is missing when he refuses to try new foods.

Episodes.Title: The Story of Jazz The Carnival King
Episodes.Plot: Jazz is too proud to admit he can't dance, so Adam and the others find a clever way to teach the stubborn jaguar some new moves.

Episodes.Title: The Story of Patsy The Porcupine
Episodes.Plot: The savannah animals take Patsy for granted as she always tidies up after them. What happens when she has a fall and hurts herself?

Episodes.Title: The Story of the Together Stones
Episodes.Plot: Wally Two Trees gives the animals a special stone each to bring them together. Only it doesn't, it just makes them fight. Or does it?

Episodes.Title: The Story of Thelma the Whale
Episodes.Plot: Thelma is feeling left out so Jamie the puffin invites her to play in Mossy Bay. The other residents are less pleased about her visit - she is far too big for Mossy Bay! So big in fact she gets stuck! Thelma redeems herself by entertaining everybody while they wait for the tide to come in and free her.

Episodes.Title: The Story of the Best Christmas Ever
Episodes.Plot: The other animals are upset when Melanie gives their precious Christmas tree away to a family of bisons. They soon realise that Christmas is about sharing, not just having the best tree.

Episodes.Title: The Story of Alan's Catchy Tune
Episodes.Plot: Zed and Herbert need a new tune for the concert that evening, and Alan has composed a lovely one, but he is too shy to play it to them.

Episodes.Title: The Story of the Baby Bison
Episodes.Plot: Alife and Charlie find a lost baby bison, so they follow the clues to help her get home safely.

Episodes.Title: The Story of Zed The Hero Of Africa
Episodes.Plot: The volcano is threatening to erupt but the animals are reluctant to leave their beautiful savannah home. Can anybody come to the rescue?

Episodes.Title: The Story of Herbert's Watermelons
Episodes.Plot: Nigel has offered to look after Herbert's precious watermelon crop on ripening day - what could possibly go wrong?

Episodes.Title: The Story of Doris' Precious Things
Episodes.Plot: Doris is determined to build the biggest collection of interesting things in Africa, but she upsets the other animals when she takes things that they need.

Episodes.Title: The Story of Leopoldo The Llama
Episodes.Plot: Leopoldo is fed up at always having to play everybody else's choice of games. He decides to climb a mountain on his own as nobody else wants to come with him - but they all soon realise that perhaps it is more fun doing things with your friends after all.
